document_name: Human Security Initiative for Tensions Reduction Project Document

outputs.output_descr: Human security initiative for "tensions" reduction, reconciliation and rehabilitation in the Solomon Islands is a joint initiative by UNDP, UNICEF and ILO. It is funded by the United Nations Trust Fund for Human Security. Its goal is to enhance human security for the selected communities and ex-combatants in the Solomon Islands through reducing "tensions" and promoting peaceful and sustainable measures for their survival and dignity.

project_descr: Human Security Initiative for Tensions Reduction, Reconciliation and Rehabilitation in the Solomon Islands, Joint Programme Initiative with UNDP, ILO and UNICEF
